name: Snowbody
description:
You are just a Snowbody but can you defeat the evil Bunnys in an epic battle?

Controls

[WASD]  Move
[Mouse]  Aim / Shoot
[Escape]  Pause

Features

8 unique Weapons to find
4 Enemy Types
7 Enemy Waves
1 Evil Boss

Weapons Click to see all Weapons
(it's more fun to first play the game and find them)


The Weapon a Snowman is born with. Slow Firerate and not much damage. But good for some Rabbits!

It's a simple stick with a bit of frosty magic. Much better than nothing.

Its even glowing from all the frost magic. Heavy projectile with long range and much damage.

It's so slippery the projectiles are lightning fast with a huge range.

A piece of wood carved into a rifle. Massive firerate but just small damage for each wooden bullet.

As close as you can get to a shotgun in an icethemed game. Shoots three bullets at once each with good damage. Just a short range.

Slow fire rate and slow projectile speed. Projectile doesn't do any damage. But it exlodes and releases a deadly collection of 50 explosives each dealing 2 damage. 

Stolen right from a WizardRabbits head, there are still some magic Bunnys in there. But now they fight on our side!

A Game made while following a tutorial by Blackthornprod https://www.udemy.com/course/creating-a-cool-2d-action-game-in-unity/

I added many mechanics and used this project to learn a lot about Unity.

  • improved dropchance system
  • more versatile weapon creation scripts
  • different projectile types
  • Weapon Panel

A great base for me for future projects.

Code on https://github.com/TobiasWust/snowbodygame

All Graphics and Sounds made by myself.
